snippet: With the markets in a downturn and economies weak overseas, Fed officials said that they saw little risk in postponing an increase in interest rates.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen  announces central bank will postpone any increase in interest rates until later in 2015; says agency is still concerned about fragility of economic recovery in light of uncertainties in global economy.

byline.contributor: Jack Ewing contributed reporting from Frankfurt.

lead_paragraph: With the markets in a downturn and economies weak overseas, Fed officials said that they saw little risk in postponing an increase in interest rates.

headline.print_headline: Federal Reserve Delays Raising Interest Rates
